page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT IN THE VALLEYS
page.content: A large percentage of fathers who are actually in work have jobs associated with the coalmining industry.Some work at the{Penrhiwceiber Colliery}(which closes at the end of the year),the {Phurnacite Smokeless Fuels Plant}at Abercwmboi and the{Taff Vale Colliery at Aberfan. Other fathers have employment in a variety of jobs such as Gas Board fitters,builders,postmen,bus drivers, labourers,Telecom engineers etc.From the results of our job survey there seem to be limited number of parents in the catchment area of the schools, with 'professional'type jobs such as doctors,dentists,solicitors,teachers etc Many of the mothers particularly in Mountain Ash have part time jobs in factories in Cardiff or Pontypridd, such as{"Memory Lane Cakes"
